summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such city on March 5, 1912, the question of the issuance and sale of negotiable bonds of said city in the sum of One Hundred Twenty-five Thousand ($125,000) Dollars to providing money for the construction of hospitals, sanatoriums, and other buildings and structures necessary for the treatment, prevention and cure of tuberculosis.
